title: How about a new movespeed rune in resolve?
body: Would it be possible to implement a rune that gave movespeed based on missing health.

replies.body: Oh god I didn't even think of him.
Garen's fast enough already.  And you don't want Shen being able to catch up to you easily.
Pretty much this right here. Any tank that can catch up faster to drop CC on someone is going to make the game miserable.
Non of these even crossed my bronze mind. Very true.

this is like the worst idea i have seen here in a while that i don't think has been a troll post.

what serevas said..

that would be an absolute nightmare..

Guys it's just satire.

Calm down.
